website_summaries.verdict: This large, 8-cup blender can handle almost anything you can fit in it. It's best for use with vegetables, fruits, and walnuts.
pros: Intended for use with vegetables, fruits, meat, and nuts
Comes with metal blade and plastic dough mixer
cons: No way to affix to the counter, so it may slide around during use

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality all around.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Might return. 1. The pads on the bottom are not sticky enough, and therefore every time you spin the handle, the whole processor slides. 2. Blades are waaaaay dull, hence they get stuck in the food, jerk the processor, which (see #1) then flies out. Trying out ways to remedy the situation, such as sharpen the blades, hold the processor sideways under my armpit, or just get annoyed enough to return. So, probably returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ayn

customer_reviews.title: Chopper bowl warped in hot sink water.
customer_reviews.text: I always wash items like this before I use them, I sat it in a sink full of hot dish water with a host of other utensils. When I pulled it out it was warped beyond repair and was totally unusable. I had one that looked just like this one for years - never had a single problem until I broke the handle.
customer_reviews.author: _NOP;

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased this item. For the past 3-4 years I've had similar items but they all had a suction section so that it sticks to the counter top. This one does not. So it is very very hard to use since it just moves all around... I am so upset that I did not notice this in advance
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: cuts it all evenly from course to fine with very few cranks of the handle
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to do 2 onions at a time, cuts it all evenly from course to fine with very few cranks of the handle. Top locks down with a twist instead of suction, which is great! Stays put as I crank, blades are super sharp. Easy to wash. My new right hand in the kitchen, love it. It was packaged well and got here quickly, very happy with my purchase and the distributor/brand Momugs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have one simular to this that is at least ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one simular to this that is at least 20 years old and just started having problems with it. When i saw this one i jumped
customer_reviews.author: Always Waggin' Board-N-Groom

customer_reviews.title: Hand powered food processors are great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't certain about buying this one because I usually see electric food processors. I must say I am very pleased with my purchase. It's not too small to handle anything I need to do. It's great for small kitchens and everyday meal preparations.
customer_reviews.author: Asheley Ward

customer_reviews.title: If its soft, it will chop it
customer_reviews.text: Bought and donated to Project Wildlife to help with food prep for animals. Need to be able to chop many fruits and veggies into a "salad". Sweet potato and oranges didn't work. You have to peel the orange to get it to chop it, otherwise it just scrapes the orange off the peel. If you are using it for fairly soft items, it will work for you. Just didn't work for our application...easier to use a knife.
customer_reviews.author: stephen Dillon

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CHOPPER
customer_reviews.text: I had two other choppers that I had purchased at a State Fair and both had just worn out from use. Found this one on Amazon and decided to order it because of how much it held. I LOVE IT! Chops onion and other veggies fast and so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product the first time I used it, until I washed it on the top rack of the dishwasher. Now it's ruined and warped. I wish it advertised it as not dishwasher safe and I realize I should have read the description closer. Anyhow, I don't know who has time to hand-wash this item and next time I'll choose a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Salsa
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my class to make home made salsa. I had to watch them closely because this worked so well they made mush the first time spinning the tomatoes.. It really worked well. Next batch was perfect And they were excited to make it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P.

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. My wife
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. My wife, daughter and myself love it. Out of the 4 prior manual mills, this is the best. I going to order another in the next few days. Money well invested.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for a manual food processor
customer_reviews.text: Good idea. Works ok. Pre cutting harder foods like root veg helps with processing. Very sharp be careful when cleaning. Rinsing or soaking blades and container immediately after use and before food dries on them helps alot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazamA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for chopping and it's easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Shopping

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace one that had broken. This one is much smaller than my last one but it will still do the job. I do like the no slip bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Montana

customer_reviews.title: The best Chopper I've ever had in 52 years of marriage!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chopper. And I had never heard of Momug before. So it was a stab in the dark. I was so crazy about the chopper that I bought 7 more for my kids and siblings. They all love love love it! My daughter said it's like slicing through butter! Virginia
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think it would work, but it did. It would be very helpful if there was an instruction book included.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy D. York

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I love these counter top, self-turn choppers. When my other one wore out, I had to have antoher one. This one has worked just fine so far!
customer_reviews.author: SGamble

customer_reviews.title: Good size cup
customer_reviews.text: angle on handle makes it easier to turn than previous ones I've owned. Good size cup. Super glad it did NOT come with 20 extra attachments that never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Salsa Maker
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love the color and it's large container,I chop onion,celery,carrots,and more veggies with this chopper,it done the job well.The most amazing thing is it can hold lots and lots veggies, so I can make lots salsa at one time,lol,time saver.Love it,recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Chopper doesn’t chop
customer_reviews.text: The blades didn’t chop. The vegetables I put inside just went in circles with the blades. The little that was cut looked more like a purée and not chopped vegetables. I’ve had other models that looked exactly the same but actually worked. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find out that this can chop/dice/mince an entire bowl full and in a snap. You can chop as course or fine as you like. Washing is a breeze also. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: atagirl

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Clean in Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I used this for Months & was VERY Happy & Pleased with it, the 3 Cutting Blades worked GREAT. I recently moved to a House that has a Dishwasher, it Warped the Bowl to the Point that I can NO LONGER use it, Amazon did make it right, I recommend this Product, but DO NOT WASH IN DISHWASHER!!!
customer_reviews.author: L Dwayne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Does what my $350 Cuisinart did. Buy one.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is amazing. Chops anything I throw at it - filled to the brim! Love this device. Inexpensive and super easy to use & clean. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Saga

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: great product. No complaints on this at all. Bought because I like manual devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro Hetfield

customer_reviews.title: I GOT A DUSTER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this “product” because I went to Walmart and bought a slap blender and after vigorous slapping my slap blender it finally stopped blending. I order this “blender” and I wait about a week and 1/2 to open my mailbox to a 8 ft. duster from Jenny Liu... I dunno who Jenny Liu is and why she has my blender but you wont get away with pulling this quick switcharoo on me.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron T.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I made salsa with our fresh veggie and in seconds it's done. I need to buy a second one for the cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: It works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chopper for my son. He said he loves it! It works very well and holds a lot of food. He meal preps and it comes in handy that he can do multiple day batches of food shopping in one round.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie F.

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing hand grinder ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing hand grinder ever!!!! Chops and grinds veggies very well clockwise and counter-clockwise. Made hummus and it was very smooth. Does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Candlestick56

customer_reviews.title: not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it chops however who doesn't make something dishwasher safe this day and time. Kids put it in dishwasher and now lid won't fit bowl due to dishwasher heat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great for making homemade salsa. Durable and easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Rako

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! Amazing quality! Great for so many dishes. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Poorly built. The screw that hold one of the blades was tightened too much and the plastic broke. meaning one of the blades can fall anytime. Can’t use it, I don’t want plastic pieces in my food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl was put in the top shelf of the dishwasher and came out deformed. This shouldn't happen. Great for chopping onions.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to kitchen if you doing light cook when needed works great

customer_reviews.title: Price is great for quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my restaurant for chopped cabbage chopped onions it’s good for anything that needs chopped or diced

customer_reviews.title: Warp bowl, top doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: The bowl warped after first use, not a good quality product...

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ this item

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for making chicken salad
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I bought this thing.... I have had one for the last 5 years that I finally broke the handle a few weeks ago. It is perfect for making chicken salad, including slicing the chicken etc. My old one has suction cups on the bottom which hold it firmly to counter. This trash does not even have one. I tried to use it the other day and it was outrageously hard to handle. I ended up taking the handle off and using it on my 5 year old unit. The final straw is that you can get on cheaper with the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Percy C.

customer_reviews.title: Dont put in a dishwasher. I did and the drying heat warped it
customer_reviews.text: Junk Does no good in a dishwasher Mine warped Top no longer fits

customer_reviews.title: Blades are plastic and not sharp
customer_reviews.text: Blades are not sharp and I fairly sure they’re just plastic. Whole unit is trash

customer_reviews.title: Chopper
customer_reviews.text: Love the chopper till I put it in the top of my dishwasher. It was round but not any more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide mouth bowl. I can make twice as much guacamole all at once.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. I used it on a onion and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. I used it on a onion and it maked nice small pieces. Just like I like.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly a great and easy to use product !
customer_reviews.text: Must be a great product because I have not heard my wife complain 😀

customer_reviews.text: Used for chopping all types of vegetables for restaurant use. Easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I have had better but still does what it’s meant to do.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This little food processor works great!! Need it to make my salsa and it allows me to chop every at the right consistency and cuts my prep time by half.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: better than I hoped. It's great! Saves me lots of time.

customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 6 months. Nice food processor. Blades are really sharp. Good quality.

customer_reviews.text: Too big should have noticed the size before I ordered and it does not hold a suction

customer_reviews.title: It is safe to use
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Pico de Gallo mixture easy to use clean and storage no more crying when you chop onions

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow I like to and easy to use thank you

customer_reviews.title: easy turning
customer_reviews.text: Love it! 100% better than my old one. Easy to turn chopped right through all my veggies and I could add much more than I thought.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easier to use and cuts better than other less expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Figenshow

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of a kind chopper. The fact that I don’t need to plug it in makes my life easier. It’s easy to use, fast, safe, easy to clean. I think this is a must in every kitchen.. i bought ine for myself and when i used it i bought one for my friend and soon i will buy it for my sister when she finishes her kitchen. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fashionesta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It's manual 😑 huge bummer. Doesn't work I have it there used once for fruits and it's just sits there now. Can't cut butter in hot sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is really big. I guess I didn't pay ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really big. I guess I didn't pay attention to the large cup size when I ordered. I haven't actually used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Not great for chopped salads
customer_reviews.text: Not great for chopped salads. This product works great, too great. I bought this to make chopped salads but even two turns makes salsa out of my salad. I used pre-bagged salad so I am going to try again with larger pieces of lettuce. Would be excellent for salsa. It also has a nice little hole where you can pour olive oil or dressing. If you want very finely chopped salad this would be great, If you just want your salad chopped like at a restaurant, this might not be the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fay

customer_reviews.title: A highly efficient salsa maker that's a breeze to use
customer_reviews.text: Tired of a salsa maker that's been sticking for months and being able to do no more than a cup at a time, it was time to save my arm and replace it.This has been absolutely terrific! I can fill it and very easily crank it a few times with ease and get a full bowl of salsa. My previous maker had two blades close to the bottom, this one has three spaced from the bottom to near the top. And yes, the blades are sharp. They are BLADES! And you will likely get cut if you're careless in which case, just buy salsa in jars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, sturdy, simple and quick to use. Easy to Clean.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one in almond color years ago. We used it alot, better than the electric ones. Don't have to plug it in . After mush use, I broke the handle. But it lasted a very very long time. Then I found this as a replacement n a larger capacity. I have used it. It chops to the size and consistency I want depending upon how much I rotate it. It rotates easily and chopes consistnetly and uniformly. It is easy to clean and store. Again, I don't have to plug it in to use, I don't have to be careful to not get the motor wet cause it dont have one. I can put it in the dishwaher too.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time we go for camping and picnics. We often need something to chop veggies, onions etc. Cutting them with knife is time consuming and tedious job. This food processor comes handy in such scenarios. We just cut onions in four pieces and rotate handle couple of times and hurray we get finely chopped onions. We always like to show off this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Pramod Koli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a smaller version years ago and decided to get the bigger one. This is, probably, one of my most used kitchen tools. Mills through carrots and firm vegetables with ease. Can chop and mix an egg salad with just a few cranks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Epiphany, the reader

customer_reviews.title: Mush Maker
customer_reviews.text: This does not produce food resembling anything in the product pictures. The bottom blade is too high so things like garlic, cilantro, onion often do not get chopped adequately because they tend to get trapped on the bottom and I don't even want to think about what it does to tomatoes. Blech!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't chop vegetables.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to chop my vegetables. I sliced up my onions to chop, with this device, to saute. Long story, short; it didn't chop, just mixed up. Very disappointing. I wanted to chop up carrots, spinach, and other vegies to make vegetable drinks. No point in trying carrots if it can't chop onions. I need a better chopper then this thing. Yes it is a thing, not a chopper.
customer_reviews.author: James Fulks

customer_reviews.title: Great Manual Processor
customer_reviews.text: The Processor looks exactly like the picture! I had a different brand for about 16 years, and was so disappointed when it broke! I debated on the replacement for a while... finally decided on this one, and I'm glad I did! It's perfect! Some people reviewed that the rubber bottom didn't hold the bowl in place, Not true, I have had no problem with it moving around while turning the handle/blades! So easy to use, and not loud like an electric processor! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LilBitVal

customer_reviews.title: Super Chopper!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little chopper! My go to for salsa! I’ve chopped onions, tomatoes, peppers & garlic in this. You will need to chunk them up first before adding though. This is very sharp!! Only one small negative & it’s not that big of a deal cuz I love this thing! A little tricky twisting the top on & off because it’s a very light material but got used to it after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Candygrl5

customer_reviews.title: don't waste money to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: ordered it and then tried for one hour, it is a very cheap-made item, cannot spin fast to chop the vegetable well, so I just returned it at the same day when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little chopper.
customer_reviews.text: This makes chopping up my salsa faster and smaller than my cuts. The only small thing is you have to start out by working the handle back and forth a bit to get it started. But I use it all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Videographer/Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Not for your dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This worked well until it got put in dishwasher (top shelf). The bowl melted and now I have a shiny blade that doesn't fit into my food processor. I see that it says not dishwasher safe. Take that as gospel!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kitchen gadget. Use it almost daily for chopping onions and bell peppers. Makes good salsa too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is the best..
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these blenders.. I make salsa with them.. this is by far the best one I have owned.. real strong gears.. other blenders the gear inside breaks..
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase. Size is perfect, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this chopper, I have a smaller one from a different brand. Was looking for something larger and this was a perfect solution. It's awesome for salsas and pico de gallo in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: shellynn9876

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and chops vegetables well..this works better than an electric unit which usually turns veggies into a paste!

customer_reviews.title: No Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to remember not to place in dishwasher. Finally did...and the bowl bend to stop functioning.

customer_reviews.title: bowl warps under heat when cleaned in an automatic dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Good cover with crank, efficient cutting blades. The bowl warps under heat when cleaned in an automatic dishwasher, even with heat turned off during drying cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for chopping walnuts.
customer_reviews.text: Chops up walnuts without any problem. I use walnuts for a lot of my baking and I sure do appreciate this processor. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! it does as it claims to be. I have been using it almost everyday for two months and no problem.

customer_reviews.text: chop chop chop is what it does and does well!!! sturdy, non-slip - it WILL chop!!!!! thank you!!

customer_reviews.text: My old one broke and it did a great job of mincing. This one is very similar. Happy with my choice

customer_reviews.title: Can you read Chinese?
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I cannot tell you about the great features of this product. The box is in Chinese and I don't read Chinese. There is no instruction sheet in any language. I did find English labels for the accessories on the box, but that was all I could read. Probably deserves more stars than I gave it. Had to give it at least one star to be able to post. Product probably deserves more stars than one. Guess I will have to print out the Amazon page so I know what this product is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Phylis

customer_reviews.title: Not for hummus
customer_reviews.text: Seems well designed, however not good for my intended purpose (hummus)

product_meta.title: Momugs 8 Cup Red Food Processor, Manual Hand-powered Crank Large Chopper Mincer Blender Mixer Cutter with Clear Container for Baby Kids Toddler to Chop Meat Fruits Vegetables Nuts Herbs Onions Garlics
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY & SAFETY - Momugs' food chopper products have an extra large 8 cup capacity, made from BPA free, food-safe ABS resin,it's have 3 sharp blades,the blades are in the container when it works,safe to use, don't worry you can't prepare more food and ingredients at a time

WIDELY USE:Powerful hand chopper,ideal for vegetable,fruit,meat,walnut,and baby food, it can help you slice and mix vegetable salad,make salsa,fruit salad,chop nuts,pesto, lettuce,cabbage,hummus,sauces,guacamole, meat and bacon easily and quickly,so it meet most kitchen food chopping need,well done as garlic chopper,salad chopper,salsa maker,onion chopper,lettuce chopper,a great gift idea for wife,chef,friends

EASY TURNING & EASY TO USE- Manual food chopper is easy to use,you just need to put the medium-sized food or vegetables,meat into the chopper, then you turn the handle to finish.Chop food according to your cooking plan, if you want your food to be small chunks, you just need to turn a few more circles,if you want very small pieces,just do more turning,it's a time saving kitchen tool
EASY TO CLEAN - Clean up is easy, simply rinse with water after use and drip dry，hand wash recommend,Notice: Do Not place the container bowl in dishwasher

CONVINIENT & WITHOUT ELECTRICITY - It’s work without electricity,you can make off-grid cooking when your family in Self-driving tour,picnic,camping,travel,it’s a great help for enjoying a pleasant picnic tour

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
